First, this is not specific to facebook, these are just platform permissions that anyone including yourself can make an app and request the user to grant them these permissions so it is all based on user's consent.
Second, many of the parts you highlight as dangerous as this way for the sake of the user. Lets take sending SMS without your intervention as an example, if you had to intervene this means that every singly time you use any sms app to send an sms the platform will show you a dialog asking your consent which is a horrible experience, instead you grant the permission once to an app that you trust.
